meanings.definition: A person who has been dumped by their romantic partner.
meanings.sent1: The dumpee felt sad after the breakup.
meanings.sent2: She was the dumpee in their relationship.
meanings.sent3: The dumpee joked about being single again.
meanings.sent4: Being the dumpee was like falling into a deep hole.
meanings.sent5: The dumpee's heartache was visible to everyone.

meanings.definition: The recipient of unwanted or discarded items.
meanings.sent1: The charity gladly accepted the dumpee of old clothes.
meanings.sent2: He became the dumpee of broken toys from his siblings.
meanings.sent3: The dumpee of the unwanted gifts found a creative use for them.
meanings.sent4: The garage sale had a section for dumpee items.
meanings.sent5: The dumpee of the abandoned furniture turned it into art.
